scripts.bootstrap:unix: turbo run bootstrap:unix && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up -d --build --force-recreate
scripts.bootstrap:windows: turbo run bootstrap:windows && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml down -v && docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.yaml up -d --build --force-recreate
